verses.text: \w Shout|strong="H7321"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\w Serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*, approach \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* ringing cries.

\w Be|strong="H3808"\w* \w sure|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w alone|strong="H3045"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*. \w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w us|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w pasture|strong="H4830"\w*.

Enter \w his|strong="H1288"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w with|strong="H2691"\w* \w thanksgiving|strong="H8426"\w*, \w his|strong="H1288"\w* \w courts|strong="H2691"\w* \w with|strong="H2691"\w* \w praise|strong="H8416"\w*. \w Give|strong="H3034"\w* \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* \w to|strong="H8034"\w* \w him|strong="H1288"\w*, \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w his|strong="H1288"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w love|strong="H2617"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w ages|strong="H5769"\w* \w endures|strong="H5769"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w faithfulness|strong="H2617"\w*.
